Farm Module

class farm.Farm[source]

Bases: object

Farm class that manages all animals. Handles adding, removing, and caring for animals.

add_animal(animal)[source]

Add a new animal to the farm

breed_animals(animal_type)[source]

Try to breed two animals of the same type

feed_all()[source]

Feed all alive animals on the farm

get_all_status()[source]

Get status of all animals

get_animal_count(animal_type)[source]

Count how many alive animals of a specific type we have

initialize_farm()[source]

Create initial animals for the farm (at least 5)

play_with_all()[source]

Play with all alive animals on the farm

remove_animal(animal)[source]

Remove an animal from the farm

update_all()[source]

Update all animals’ states (called each day)
